name: REWIND Video
description:
Brackeys Jam 2020.2

You are managing a video store. Fill customers requests by click and dragging the video they want to them. When they return make sure to REWIND the video before returning to the pile or filling a new customers request.

Make sure to get returned videos from customers fast before they get mad and destroy your stock!

You can buy new stock, and sell unused videos.

Sometimes the REWIND station will break (Taking the video with it!). Click the fix button until it is repaired. 

You have until the year 2000 to sell and make as much cash as you can. If you run out of videos the game will end.

Made for 960x540 resolution.
